<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In COFF, most of the defined symbols don&#39;t contain the size information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hence, we calculate the &quot;implicit&quot; size of symbol by taking the delta of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offsets of consecutive symbols within a block. We maintain a balanced tree</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set of symbols sorted by offset per each block in order to achieve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// logarithmic time complexity of sorted symbol insertion. Symbol is inserted to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the set once it&#39;s processed in graphifySymbols. In this function, we iterate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// each collected symbol in sorted order and calculate the implicit size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> COFFLinkGraphBuilder::calculateImplicitSizeOfSymbols() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/cofflinkgraphbuilder/#ad060889087921dea07f0d8e4e145276f">COFFSectionIndex</a> SecIndex = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">       SecIndex &lt;= static&#95;cast&lt;COFFSectionIndex&gt;(Obj.getNumberOfSections());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">       SecIndex++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;SymbolSet = SymbolSets&#91;SecIndex&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SymbolSet.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    jitlink::Block &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/cofflinkgraphbuilder/#a8d7d1e194a2ffea5bd3d317c62bc2644">getGraphBlock</a>(SecIndex);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a59b5f232ad8ec6bf405ddc77c3d6d752">orc::ExecutorAddrDiff</a> LastOffset = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a59b5f232ad8ec6bf405ddc77c3d6d752">orc::ExecutorAddrDiff</a> LastDifferentOffset = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a59b5f232ad8ec6bf405ddc77c3d6d752">orc::ExecutorAddrDiff</a> LastSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = SymbolSet.rbegin(); It != SymbolSet.rend(); It++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a59b5f232ad8ec6bf405ddc77c3d6d752">orc::ExecutorAddrDiff</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = It-&gt;first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">      jitlink::Symbol &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armbuildattrs/#aea10ca6bf098a425d51ac7fe65d30ed6aa10cda45fcbf7c8c9804e4e4d2e1bcdf">Symbol</a> = It-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a59b5f232ad8ec6bf405ddc77c3d6d752">orc::ExecutorAddrDiff</a> CandSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Last offset can be same when aliasing happened</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armbuildattrs/#aea10ca6bf098a425d51ac7fe65d30ed6aa10cda45fcbf7c8c9804e4e4d2e1bcdf">Symbol</a>-&gt;getOffset() == LastOffset)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// COMDAT handling:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When IMAGE&#95;SCN&#95;LNK&#95;COMDAT flag is set in the flags of a section,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the section is called a COMDAT section. It contains two symbols</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in a sequence that specifes the behavior. First symbol is the section</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symbol which contains the size and name of the section. It also contains</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// selection type that specifies how duplicate of the symbol is handled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Second symbol is COMDAT symbol which usually defines the external name and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since two symbols always come in a specific order, we initiate pending COMDAT</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// export request when we encounter the first symbol and actually exports it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when we process the second symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process the first symbol of COMDAT sequence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">Expected&lt;Symbol &#42;&gt; COFFLinkGraphBuilder::createCOMDATExportRequest(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    COFFSymbolIndex SymIndex, object::COFFSymbolRef <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">Symbol</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> object::coff&#95;aux&#95;section&#95;definition &#42;Definition) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/#abee99c9c75d23a0304e5e58e3128a55f">Linkage</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/#abee99c9c75d23a0304e5e58e3128a55fac43e0fd449c758dab8f891d8e19eb1a9">Linkage::Strong</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Definition-&gt;Selection) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
